dashboards_data.name: CNAPP - Runtime Workload Protection/Scan Status
dashboards_data.description: Status of discovered running VMs, K8S Clusters, Serverless Functions, Container Instances (Drift)

data.phrase:
config timeframe = 24h
| dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.category = "VM Instance"
// | filter xdm.asset.realm != "ON_PREM"
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)
| fields xdm.asset.name, xdm.asset.strong_id, xdm.asset.provider, xdm.asset.cloud.region, xdm.asset.realm, xdm.asset.type.name, xdm.asset.tags, xdm.asset.normalized_fields, xdm.asset.raw_fields, xdm.asset.last_observed, xdm.kubernetes.cluster.name
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)

| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter Function not contains "SDWAN" and Function not contains "Firewall" and Function not contains "Panorama"
| alter agentType = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.agent.type"]
| alter Agentless = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_agentless_vulnerability_analyzer"].scanner_type
| alter K8S_Cluster = xdm.kubernetes.cluster.name
| alter Protected = if(K8S_Cluster != null and agentType = "CLOUD", "Protected K8S Node", K8S_Cluster != null, "Unprotected K8S Node", agentType in ("CLOUD", "REGULAR"), "Protected VM", Agentless = "agentless", "Agentless Scan", agentType = null, "Not Scanned/Protected")
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)
| fields Group_ID, Application, ApplicationCI, Application_Owner, Environment, Function, Protected, xdm.asset.name as Name, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Region, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, agentType, xdm.asset.tags as Tags, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed
| comp count (ResourceID ) as VMs by protected
| sort desc VMs   

| view graph type = pie xaxis = protected yaxis = VMs valuecolor("Not Scanned/Protected","#ec0101") valuecolor("Agentless Scan","#5400ff") valuecolor("Protected VM","#111fff") valuecolor("Unprotected K8S Node","#ff0037")

actionData.xqlPhrase:
config timeframe = 24h
| dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.category = "VM Instance"
| filter xdm.asset.realm != "ON_PREM"
| fields xdm.asset.name, xdm.asset.strong_id, xdm.asset.provider, xdm.asset.cloud.region, xdm.asset.realm, xdm.asset.type.name, xdm.asset.tags, xdm.asset.normalized_fields, xdm.asset.raw_fields, xdm.asset.last_observed, xdm.kubernetes.cluster.name
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| alter agentType = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.agent.type"]
| alter Agentless = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_agentless_vulnerability_analyzer"].scanner_type
| alter K8S_Cluster = xdm.kubernetes.cluster.name
| alter Protected = if(K8S_Cluster != null and agentType = "CLOUD", "Protected K8S Node", K8S_Cluster != null, "Unprotected K8S Node", agentType in ("CLOUD", "REGULAR"), "Protected VM", Agentless = "agentless", "Agentless Scan Only", agentType = null, "Not Scanned/Protected")
| filter $x_axis.value = Protected
| filter Function not contains "SDWAN" and Function not contains "Firewall" and Function not contains "Panorama"
| fields xdm.asset.name as Name, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Region, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, Protected, agentType, Group_ID, Application, ApplicationCI, Application_Owner, Environment, Function, xdm.asset.tags as Tags, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed

data.phrase:
dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.category  = "Kubernetes Cluster"
| filter xdm.asset.type.name not in ("ECS Clusters")
// | filter xdm.asset.type.name in ("Amazon EKS", "Azure Kubernetes Cluster", "Google Kubernetes Engine Container Cluster", "Generic Kubernetes Cluster")
| alter K8s_Scan  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_k8s_compliance_publisher"].scan_analysis_result
| alter K8s_Agent  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_k8s_malware_analyzer"].scan_analysis_result
| alter K8s_Agent_Version  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_k8s_compliance_publisher"].scanner_version
| alter K8s_scanType  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_k8s_compliance_publisher"].scanner_type
// GCP Only
| alter GcpNodeCount  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"].currentNodeCount
| alter KSPM_Status =  xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> [ "xdm.kubernetes.connector.status"]

| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")

| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)

| alter Protected = if (
K8s_Agent = "success" and xdm.kubernetes.connector.status = "connected", "Protected_KSPM", 
K8s_Agent = "success", "Protected_No_KSPM", 
K8s_Scan = "success" and xdm.kubernetes.connector.status = "connected", "Scanned_KSPM",  
K8s_Scan = "success", "Scanned_No_KSPM", 
K8s_Scan = null , "Not Scanned/Protected") 
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)


| fields Group_ID, Application, ApplicationCI, Application_Owner, Environment, Function, Protected, K8s_Agent, K8s_Agent_Version, K8s_scanType, KSPM_Status, GcpNodeCount, xdm.asset.name as Name, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Region, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, xdm.kubernetes.cluster.version as K8S_Version,  xdm.asset.tags as Tags, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed
| filter (Function not contains """SDWAN""" and Function not contains """Firewall""" and Function not contains """Panorama""") 
| comp count (ResourceID ) as Clusters by protected
| sort desc Clusters  




| view graph type = pie xaxis = protected yaxis = Clusters valuecolor("Not Scanned/Protected","#e51e0b")

data.phrase:
dataset = asset_inventory

| filter xdm.asset.type.category = "Serverless Function"
| alter Function_Scan  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_serverless_vulnerability_analyzer"].scan_analysis_result
| alter Function_Scan_Version  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_serverless_vulnerability_analyzer"].scanner_version
| alter Function_Scan_Type  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_serverless_vulnerability_analyzer"].scanner_type
| alter Function_Runtime = xdm.cloud.function.runtime
| alter Function_Architecture = xdm.cloud.function.arch

| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)

| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)
| alter Function_Handler  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"].Handler
| alter Protected = if ( Function_Handler = "cortex.handler", "Protected Function",  Function_Handler = "twistlock.handler", "Protected Function (Prisma)",Function_Scan = "success", "Agentless Scan", Function_Scan = null , "Not Scanned/Protected") 
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)

| fields xdm.asset.name as Name, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID,   xdm.asset.id as AssetID, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Region, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, Protected, Function_Scan, Function

| filter (Function not contains """SDWAN""" and Function not contains """Firewall""" and Function not contains """Panorama""") 
| comp count (AssetID ) as Functions by protected
| sort desc Functions 











| view graph type = pie xaxis = protected yaxis = Functions valuecolor("Not Scanned/Protected","#ec0101") valuecolor("Agentless Scan","#5400ff")

data.phrase:
dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.name in ("Container Instance")
| alter Scan_Status  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_agentless_vulnerability_analyzer"].scan_analysis_result
| alter Protected = if (Scan_Status = "success", "Agentless Scan", Scan_Status = null , "Not Scanned/Protected") 
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)

| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)

| fields Protected, xdm.asset.name as Name, xdm.host.hostname as Hostname, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID,  xdm.asset.id as AssetID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Cloud_Region, xdm.image.labels as Labels, xdm.image.os as OS, xdm.image.os_distribution as Distribution, xdm.image.os_family as OS_Family, xdm.image.os_release as OS_Release, xdm.kubernetes.namespace.name as Namespace, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed, Group_ID, Application, ApplicationCI, Application_Owner, Environment, Function

| comp count (AssetID ) as Containers by protected
| sort desc Protected    


| view graph type = pie xaxis = protected yaxis = Containers valuecolor("Agentless Scan","#5400ff")

data.phrase:
dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.category = "VM Instance"
// | filter xdm.asset.realm != "ON_PREM"

| alter scanType = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_csa_vulnerability_analyzer"].scanner_type
| alter Agentless = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_agentless_vulnerability_analyzer"].scanner_type
| alter agentType =  xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.agent.type"]
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)

| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)
| alter K8S_Cluster = xdm.kubernetes.cluster.name
| alter Protected = if (K8S_Cluster != null and agentType = "CLOUD", "Protected K8S Node", K8S_Cluster != null, "Unprotected K8S Node", agentType in ("CLOUD", "REGULAR"), "Protected VM", Agentless = "agentless", "Agentless Scan", agentType = null , "Not Scanned/Protected") 
// | filter xdm.asset.cloud.region != null
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)

| fields Group_ID, Application, ApplicationCI, Application_Owner, Environment, Function, Protected, Agentless, xdm.asset.name as Name, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Region, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, xdm.host.os as OS_Version, xdm.host.os_family as OS_Family, xdm.host.state as State, scanType, agentType, K8S_Cluster, xdm.agent.type as XDR_Agent_Type, xdm.agent.version as XDR_Agent_Version,  xdm.asset.tags as Tags, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed


| filter (Function not contains """SDWAN""" and Function not contains """Firewall""" and Function not contains """Panorama""")

dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.category  = "Kubernetes Cluster"
| filter xdm.asset.type.name not in ("ECS Clusters")
// | filter xdm.asset.type.name in ("Amazon EKS", "Azure Kubernetes Cluster", "Google Kubernetes Engine Container Cluster", "Generic Kubernetes Cluster")
| alter K8s_Scan  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_k8s_compliance_publisher"].scan_analysis_result
| alter K8s_Agent  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_k8s_malware_analyzer"].scan_analysis_result

// GCP Only
| alter GcpNodeCount  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"].currentNodeCount
| alter KSPM_Status =  xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> [ "xdm.kubernetes.connector.status"]

| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")

| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)

| alter Protected = if (
K8s_Agent = "success" and xdm.kubernetes.connector.status = "connected", "Protected_KSPM", 
K8s_Agent = "success", "Protected_No_KSPM", 
K8s_Scan = "success" and xdm.kubernetes.connector.status = "connected", "Scanned_KSPM",  
K8s_Scan = "success", "Scanned_No_KSPM", 
K8s_Scan != "success" and xdm.kubernetes.connector.status = "connected", "Not Scanned/Protected_KSPM", 
K8s_Scan = null , "Not Scanned/Protected") 
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)

| alter Protected = if (Scan_Status = "success", "Agentless Scan", Scan_Status = null , "Not Scanned/Protected")

| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)

| fields Protected, xdm.asset.name as Name, xdm.host.hostname as Hostname, xdm.kubernetes.namespace.name as Namespace, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.id as AssetID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Cloud_Region, xdm.image.labels as Labels, xdm.image.os as OS, xdm.image.os_distribution as Distribution, xdm.image.os_family as OS_Family, xdm.image.os_release as OS_Release, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed, Group_ID, Application, ApplicationCI, Application_Owner, Environment, Function

input_dict.xql:
dataset = asset_inventory 
| fields xdm.asset.realm
| dedup xdm.asset.realm
| sort asc xdm.asset.realm

dataset = asset_inventory 
| alter Group_ID = xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"]
| fields Group_ID
| dedup Group_ID
| sort asc Group_ID

data.phrase:
config timeframe = 24h
| dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.category = "VM Instance"
// | filter xdm.asset.realm != "ON_PREM"
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)
| fields xdm.asset.name, xdm.asset.strong_id, xdm.asset.provider, xdm.asset.cloud.region, xdm.asset.realm, xdm.asset.type.name, xdm.asset.tags, xdm.asset.normalized_fields, xdm.asset.raw_fields, xdm.asset.last_observed, xdm.kubernetes.cluster.name
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)

| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter Function not contains "SDWAN" and Function not contains "Firewall" and Function not contains "Panorama"
| alter agentType = xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.agent.type"]
| alter Agentless = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_agentless_vulnerability_analyzer"].scanner_type
| alter K8S_Cluster = xdm.kubernetes.cluster.name
| alter Protected = if(K8S_Cluster != null and agentType = "CLOUD", "Protected K8S Node", K8S_Cluster != null, "Unprotected K8S Node", agentType in ("CLOUD", "REGULAR"), "Protected VM", Agentless = "agentless", "Agentless Scan", agentType = null, "Not Scanned/Protected")
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)
| fields Group_ID, Application, ApplicationCI, Application_Owner, Environment, Function, Protected, xdm.asset.name as Name, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Region, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, agentType, xdm.asset.tags as Tags, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed
| comp count (ResourceID ) as VMs by protected
| sort desc VMs   

| view graph type = pie xaxis = protected yaxis = VMs valuecolor("Not Scanned/Protected","#ec0101") valuecolor("Agentless Scan","#5400ff") valuecolor("Protected VM","#111fff") valuecolor("Unprotected K8S Node","#ff0037")

dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.category = "VM Instance"
// | filter xdm.asset.realm != "ON_PREM"

| alter scanType = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_csa_vulnerability_analyzer"].scanner_type
| alter Agentless = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_agentless_vulnerability_analyzer"].scanner_type
| alter agentType =  xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> ["xdm.agent.type"]
| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)

| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)
| alter K8S_Cluster = xdm.kubernetes.cluster.name
| alter Protected = if (K8S_Cluster != null and agentType = "CLOUD", "Protected K8S Node", K8S_Cluster != null, "Unprotected K8S Node", agentType in ("CLOUD", "REGULAR"), "Protected VM", Agentless = "agentless", "Agentless Scan", agentType = null , "Not Scanned/Protected") 
// | filter xdm.asset.cloud.region != null
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)

| fields Group_ID, Application, ApplicationCI, Application_Owner, Environment, Function, Protected, Agentless, xdm.asset.name as Name, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Region, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, xdm.host.os as OS_Version, xdm.host.os_family as OS_Family, xdm.host.state as State, scanType, agentType, K8S_Cluster, xdm.agent.type as XDR_Agent_Type, xdm.agent.version as XDR_Agent_Version,  xdm.asset.tags as Tags, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed


| filter (Function not contains """SDWAN""" and Function not contains """Firewall""" and Function not contains """Panorama""")

widgets_data.title: Cloud - K8S Clusters Scan/Protection Status - List

data.phrase:
dataset = asset_inventory
| filter xdm.asset.type.category  = "Kubernetes Cluster"
| filter xdm.asset.type.name not in ("ECS Clusters")
// | filter xdm.asset.type.name in ("Amazon EKS", "Azure Kubernetes Cluster", "Google Kubernetes Engine Container Cluster", "Generic Kubernetes Cluster")
| alter K8s_Scan  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_k8s_compliance_publisher"].scan_analysis_result
| alter K8s_Agent  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_k8s_malware_analyzer"].scan_analysis_result
| alter K8s_Agent_Version  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_k8s_compliance_publisher"].scanner_version
| alter K8s_scanType  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_k8s_compliance_publisher"].scanner_type
// GCP Only
| alter GcpNodeCount  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"].currentNodeCount
| alter KSPM_Status =  xdm.asset.normalized_fields -> [ "xdm.kubernetes.connector.status"]

| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")

| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)

| alter Protected = if (
K8s_Agent = "success" and xdm.kubernetes.connector.status = "connected", "Protected_KSPM", 
K8s_Agent = "success", "Protected_No_KSPM", 
K8s_Scan = "success" and xdm.kubernetes.connector.status = "connected", "Scanned_KSPM",  
K8s_Scan = "success", "Scanned_No_KSPM", 
K8s_Scan = null , "Not Scanned/Protected") 
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)


| fields Group_ID, Application, ApplicationCI, Application_Owner, Environment, Function, Protected, K8s_Agent, K8s_Agent_Version, K8s_scanType, KSPM_Status, GcpNodeCount, xdm.asset.name as Name, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Region, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, xdm.kubernetes.cluster.version as K8S_Version,  xdm.asset.tags as Tags, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed

| filter xdm.asset.type.category  = "Kubernetes Cluster"

| alter K8s_Scan  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_k8s_compliance_publisher"].scan_analysis_result
| alter K8s_Agent  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_k8s_malware_analyzer"].scan_analysis_result

// GCP Only

| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")

| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)

| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)

K8s_Agent = "success", "Protected_No_KSPM", 
K8s_Scan = "success" and xdm.kubernetes.connector.status = "connected", "Scanned_KSPM",  
K8s_Scan = "success", "Scanned_No_KSPM", 
K8s_Scan = null , "Not Scanned/Protected") 
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)


| fields Group_ID, Application, ApplicationCI, Application_Owner, Environment, Function, Protected, K8s_Agent, K8s_Agent_Version, K8s_scanType, KSPM_Status, GcpNodeCount, xdm.asset.name as Name, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID, xdm.asset.type.name as Type, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Region, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, xdm.kubernetes.cluster.version as K8S_Version,  xdm.asset.tags as Tags, xdm.asset.last_observed as Last_Observed
| filter (Function not contains """SDWAN""" and Function not contains """Firewall""" and Function not contains """Panorama""") 
| comp count (ResourceID ) as Clusters by protected
| sort desc Clusters  




| view graph type = pie xaxis = protected yaxis = Clusters valuecolor("Not Scanned/Protected","#e51e0b")

dataset = asset_inventory

| filter xdm.asset.type.category = "Serverless Function"
| alter Function_Scan  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_serverless_vulnerability_analyzer"].scan_analysis_result
| alter Function_Scan_Version  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_serverless_vulnerability_analyzer"].scanner_version
| alter Function_Scan_Type  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> CWP["analysis-info_serverless_vulnerability_analyzer"].scanner_type
| alter Function_Runtime = xdm.cloud.function.runtime
| alter Function_Architecture = xdm.cloud.function.arch

| alter Group_ID = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Group_ID"], "None")
| alter Application = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application"], "None")
| alter ApplicationCI = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["ApplicationCI"], "None")
| alter Application_Owner = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Application_Owner"], "None")
| alter Environment = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Environment"], "None")
| alter Function = coalesce(xdm.asset.tags -> ["Function"], "None")
| alter Environment= uppercase(Environment)

| filter Group_ID in ($FilteredGroup_ID)
| filter Application in ($FilteredApplication)
| filter Application_Owner in ($FilteredApplication_Owner)
| filter Environment in ($FilteredEnvironment)
| filter xdm.asset.realm in ($FilteredRealm)
| filter xdm.asset.provider in ($FilteredProvider)
| alter Function_Handler  = xdm.asset.raw_fields -> ["Platform Discovery"].Handler
| alter Protected = if ( Function_Handler = "cortex.handler", "Protected Function",  Function_Handler = "twistlock.handler", "Protected Function (Prisma)",Function_Scan = "success", "Agentless Scan", Function_Scan = null , "Not Scanned/Protected") 
| filter Protected in ($FilteredProtected)

| fields xdm.asset.name as Name, xdm.asset.strong_id as ResourceID,   xdm.asset.id as AssetID, xdm.asset.provider as Cloud, xdm.asset.cloud.region as Region, xdm.asset.realm as Cloud_Account, Protected, Function_Scan, Function

| filter (Function not contains """SDWAN""" and Function not contains """Firewall""" and Function not contains """Panorama""") 
| comp count (AssetID ) as Functions by protected
| sort desc Functions 











| view graph type = pie xaxis = protected yaxis = Functions valuecolor("Not Scanned/Protected","#ec0101") valuecolor("Agentless Scan","#5400ff")
